name: SD Live Search
author: Swapnil dhanrale

sections.description:
SD live seacrh is a basic search plugin for search lively.

Basic Usage

Activate the SD live Search plugin
Add the shortcode [wpbsearch] to a page or something

—
Example:

[wpbsearch]

Credits

WP Live Search
Licenses: GNU GPL, Version 2 (or later)
sections.installation:
1. Navigate to ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  3. Select sd-live-search.zip from your computer
  4. Click ‘Install Now’
  5. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
sections.faq:
1. How it works? =
    It’s a shortcode. Add [wpbsearch] to a page/post.

  2. What is required for this to work? =
    The remote site should have WordPress 4.7 or higher.

Installation Instructions

  1. Navigate to ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  3. Select sd-live-search.zip from your computer
  4. Click ‘Install Now’
  5. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
